sections.name: Lore
sections.content: The Nue is a chimera-like creature from Japanese folklore, said to have the head of a monkey, the body of a tanuki, the legs of a tiger, and a snake for a tail. It is known for its ability to transform into a black cloud and bring misfortune to those who encounter it.
